targets.rawSql: SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at) AS time, avg(extract(epoch from (completed_at - started_at))) as duration FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status = 'completed' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT status, count(*) FROM scrape_jobs GROUP BY status
SELECT u.email, q.used_today as daily_usage, q.daily_limit FROM users u JOIN quotas q ON u.id = q.user_id ORDER BY q.used_today DESC LIMIT 10
